name: Dino Smasher
description:
Made in 10 days for the DinoJam2.

Focus : Dinosaur / Theme : Volcano

-------------------------

Your vacations at the volcano SPA are ruined ! Dinosaurs are emerging back from the ground... And they're coming for you ! 

There bodies are now made of oil from all those millions years spent burried in the ground and they're still mad at you. (Some old story about you kissing a giant meteorite when you were young...)

Well... Time to smash them back into the ground !

-------------------------

Controls :
  • Aim : arrow keys or left stick
  • Shoot : X key or X button (XBox controller)
  • Validate menu : Enter key or A button (XBox controller)
  • Pause : Escape, P key or Start button (XBox controller)
Known Issue :
  • The controller stick seems to not work in the menu on the WebGL version but you can use the d-pad to navigate.

-------------------------
